org.sbolstandard.core2

Class Component

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sbolstandard.core2.Identified
      • org.sbolstandard.core2.ComponentInstance
        • org.sbolstandard.core2.Component

  • public class Component
extends ComponentInstance
    Represents the SBOL Component data model.
    Version:
    2.1
    Author:
    Zhen Zhang, Nicholas Roehner, Chris Myers

      • addRole

        public boolean addRole(URI roleURI)
        Adds the given role URI to this component's set of role URIs.
        Parameters:
        roleURI - the role URI to be added
        Returns:
        true if this set did not already contain the specified role, false otherwise.

      • removeRole

        public boolean removeRole(URI roleURI)
        Removes the given role URI from the set of roles.
        Parameters:
        roleURI - the given role URI to be removed
        Returns:
        true if the matching role reference was removed successfully, false otherwise.

        Checks if the given role URI is included in this component's set of role URIs.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if this set contains the given role URI, false otherwise.

      • clearRoles

        public void clearRoles()
        Removes all entries of this component's set of role URIs. The set will be empty after this call returns.

      • createMapsTo

        public MapsTo createMapsTo(String displayId,
                  RefinementType refinement,
                  String localId,
                  String remoteId)
                    throws SBOLValidationException
        Creates a child mapsTo for this component with the given arguments, and then adds it to its list of mapsTos.

        This method creates compliant local and remote URIs first. The compliant local URI is created with this component's persistent identity URI, followed by the given local component's display ID, followed by this component's version. The compliant remote URI is created following the same pattern. It then calls createMapsTo(String, RefinementType, URI, URI) to create a MapsTo instance.

        This method automatically creates a local component if all of the following conditions are satisfied:

        • the associated SBOLDocument instance for this component is not null;
        • if default components should be automatically created when not present for the associated SBOLDocument instance, i.e., SBOLDocument.isCreateDefaults() returns true;
        • if this component's parent ComponentDefinition instance exists; and
        • if this component's parent ComponentDefinition instance does not already have a component with the created compliant local URI.
        Parameters:
        displayId - the display ID of the MapsTo instance to be created
        refinement - the relationship between the local and remote components
        localId - the display ID of the local component
        remoteId - the display ID of the remote component
        Returns:
        the created mapsTo
        Throws:
        SBOLValidationException - if any of the following condition is satisfied:
        • if either of the following SBOL validation rules was violated: 10204, 10206;
        • an SBOL validation exception occurred in ComponentDefinition.createComponent(String, AccessType, String, String); or
        • an SBOL validation exception occurred in createMapsTo(String, RefinementType, URI, URI).

      • createMapsTo

        public MapsTo createMapsTo(String displayId,
                  RefinementType refinement,
                  URI local,
                  URI remote)
                    throws SBOLValidationException
        Creates a child MapsTo instance for this component with the given arguments, and then adds it to its list of MapsTo instances.
        Parameters:
        displayId - the display ID of the MapsTo instance to be created
        refinement - the relationship between the local and remote components
        local - the identity URI of the local component
        remote - the identity URI of the remote component
        Returns:
        the created MapsTo instance
        Throws:
        SBOLValidationException - if any of the following SBOL validation rules was violated: 10202, 10204, 10206, 10526, 10803, 10807, 10808, 10811.

      • removeMapsTo

        public boolean removeMapsTo(MapsTo mapsTo)
        Removes the given MapsTo instance from the list of MapsTo instances.
        Parameters:
        mapsTo - a MapsTo instance to be removed
        Returns:
        true if the matching MapsTo instance is removed successfully, false otherwise.
